description: Manage calendars and events in your Google account from your workspace. List, search, create, update, and delete calendars and events, including attendees, reminders, locations, and all-day events. Connect once to securely access your schedules across sessions.

clientId.description: Google OAuth2 Client ID from Google Cloud Console (APIs & Services > Credentials)

redirectUri.description: OAuth2 redirect URI (must match the one configured in Google Cloud Console)

clientSecret.description: Google OAuth2 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

refreshToken.description: Optional: Pre-existing refresh token for accessing user's calendar data

capabilities.name: generate_oauth_url
capabilities.description: Generate OAuth2 authorization URL for user to grant calendar access. User must visit this URL to authorize the application.

capabilities.name: exchange_auth_code
capabilities.description: Exchange authorization code for access and refresh tokens. Use this after user has authorized via the OAuth URL.

capabilities.name: check_auth_status
capabilities.description: Check the current authentication status and token information

capabilities.name: list_calendars
capabilities.description: List all calendars accessible to the authenticated user

capabilities.name: get_calendar
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific calendar

capabilities.name: delete_calendar
capabilities.description: Delete a calendar (WARNING: This will delete all events in the calendar)

capabilities.name: list_events
capabilities.description: List events from a calendar within a specified time range

capabilities.name: get_event
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific event
